hero.title: Treasury Management for
hero.subtitle: Streamline stablecoin disbursements with enterprise-grade security. Schedule payments, run gasless transactions, and maintain complete audit trails—all without ever giving up control of your keys.

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to manage treasury operations
features.description: Built for finance teams who need compliance, automation, and control over their treasury.

nonCustodial.title: Non-Custodial
nonCustodial.description: Your keys, your funds. We never have access to your private keys or assets.

safePowered.title: Safe-Powered
safePowered.description: Built on Gnosis Safe, the most trusted smart contract wallet in Web3.

sanctionsScreening.title: Sanctions Screening
sanctionsScreening.description: OFAC/SDN screening protects against sanctioned entities. Configurable enforcement levels ensure compliance while maintaining workflow flexibility.

auditTrail.title: Audit Trail
auditTrail.description: Complete transaction history with immutable on-chain records for compliance.

scheduledPayments.title: Scheduled Payments
scheduledPayments.description: Schedule, reschedule, and cancel disbursements ahead of time with clear approvals and visibility.

gaslessTransactions.title: Gasless Transactions
gaslessTransactions.description: Pay network fees using stablecoins so operators never need to hold native tokens.

batchTransactions.title: Batch Transactions
batchTransactions.description: Send payments to multiple recipients in a single transaction. Reduce gas costs and streamline payroll-style disbursements.

bulkImport.title: Bulk Import
bulkImport.description: Upload beneficiaries via CSV with validation, required fields, and duplicate checks.

beneficiaryTags.title: Beneficiary Tags
beneficiaryTags.description: Create tagged cohorts and launch repeat disbursement runs in seconds.

reporting.title: Reporting & Exports
reporting.description: Generate finance-ready reports and export records for reconciliation.

stablecoinNative.title: Stablecoin Native
stablecoinNative.description: First-class support for USDC and USDT with more tokens coming soon.

roleBasedAccess.title: Role-Based Access
roleBasedAccess.description: Granular permissions for your team. Admins, approvers, initiators, and more.

simpleBilling.title: Simple Billing
simpleBilling.description: Pay for the platform in stablecoins. No credit cards or bank accounts needed.

section2.title: Powerful operations,
section2.description: Automate payouts, reduce gas overhead, and run high-volume disbursements with confidence.

section3.title: Everything you need
section3.description: Built for finance teams who demand clarity and control

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Get started in minutes
howItWorks.description: Three simple steps to streamline your treasury operations.

step1.title: Connect Your Safe
step1.description: Link your existing Gnosis Safe or create a new one. Your keys stay with you.

step2.title: Add Beneficiaries
step2.description: Set up your payment recipients with wallet addresses and optional metadata.

step3.title: Send or Schedule
step3.description: Execute or schedule stablecoin disbursements with gasless options and full audit trails.

pricing.title: Transparent pricing that scales
pricing.subtitle: Pick a plan that fits your team and pay in stablecoins.
pricing.note: All plans include core treasury tools, audit trails, and compliance workflows.

cta.title: Ready to streamline your treasury?
cta.description: Join teams already using Disburse to manage their stablecoin operations with confidence and control.
cta.noCreditCard: No credit card required • Cancel anytime

footer.tagline: Non-custodial treasury management for Web3 teams.

docs.title: Documentation
docs.subtitle: Setup guides, wallet connections, and payout workflows.

gettingStarted.title: Getting started
gettingStarted.body: Connect your Safe, add beneficiaries, and run a test disbursement in minutes.

workflows.title: Payments & reporting
workflows.body: Schedule, batch, and approve disbursements with audit-ready exports for finance teams.

about.title: About Disburse
about.subtitle: We help finance teams run stablecoin operations with confidence.

mission.title: Our mission
mission.body: Make treasury operations safer, faster, and fully auditable for digital asset teams.

principles.title: Built for modern finance
principles.body: Non-custodial by design, built on Safe, and focused on compliance-ready workflows.

blog.title: Blog
blog.subtitle: Product updates and treasury operations insights.

updates.title: Product updates
updates.body: Release notes, feature launches, and platform improvements.

insights.title: Finance ops insights
insights.body: Guides on stablecoin operations, compliance, and treasury best practices.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Talk to sales or reach support.

sales.title: Sales
sales.body: Tell us about your treasury workflows and we'll set up a demo. Reach us at {{salesEmail}}.

support.title: Support
support.body: For existing customers, reach out to {{supportEmail}} for help with billing, onboarding, or troubleshooting.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: How we collect, use, and protect data.

collection.title: Information we collect
collection.body: We collect account details, organization settings, and usage data needed to provide the service.

usage.title: How we use information
usage.body: We use data to operate the platform, improve performance, and support compliance workflows.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Terms that govern your use of Disburse.

service.title: Using the service
service.body: Use the service in compliance with applicable laws and your organization's policies.

billing.title: Billing and payments
billing.body: Subscriptions renew monthly unless canceled. You are responsible for payment authorizations and fees.

upload.hint: Use the template above to ensure formatting.

errors.invalidFileType: Please upload a CSV file (.csv extension required)
errors.fileTooLarge: File size must be less than 5MB
errors.noData: CSV file contains no data rows

errors.noRowsSelected: Please select at least one valid row to import
errors.importError: Failed to import beneficiaries. Please try again.

form.noTaggedBeneficiaries: No beneficiaries match the selected tags
form.paymentLocked: Chain and token are locked to the first recipient in the batch.
form.scheduleNote: You will sign now. The relay will execute at the scheduled time.
form.scheduleInvalid: Please enter a valid date and time.
form.scheduleTooSoon: Scheduled time must be at least 1 minute in the future.
form.batchHint: Optional: add more beneficiaries to create a batch.

actions.rescheduleConfirm: Pick a new date and time for this disbursement.

payment.active: Your subscription is now active. Enjoy all {{plan}} features.
payment.enterHash: Enter the transaction hash of your payment to verify.

billing.info: Pay with stablecoins (USDC, USDT) on Ethereum Sepolia. All plans include a 30-day money-back guarantee.

screening.title: Sanctions Screening
screening.subtitle: Configure SDN screening enforcement
screening.enforcementDescription: Control how sanctions screening affects disbursements

options.offDescription: Screening is disabled. No checks are performed.
options.warnDescription: Show warnings for matches but allow disbursements to proceed.
options.blockDescription: Block disbursements with unresolved SDN matches. Admin review required.

screening.adminOnly: Only admins can change screening enforcement settings

errors.invalidSafeAddress: Invalid Safe address. Please check the address and network.
errors.notSafeOwner: You must be an owner of this Safe to link it.
